member.name: T:Rijndael256.Rijndael
member.summary: AES implementation of the Rijndael symmetric-key cipher.

member.name: M:Rijndael256.Rijndael.Encrypt(System.String,System.String,Rijndael256.KeySize)
member.summary: Encrypts data using the Rijndael cipher in CBC mode with a password derived HMAC SHA1 salt. A random 128-bit Initialization Vector is generated for the cipher, and inserted at the beginning of the resulting Base64 encoded string.
member.param: The password to encrypt the data with.
The cipher key size. 256-bit is stronger, but slower.

member.name: M:Rijndael256.Rijndael.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.String,Rijndael256.KeySize)
member.summary: Encrypts data using the Rijndael cipher in CBC mode with a password derived HMAC SHA1 salt. A random 128-bit Initialization Vector is generated for the cipher, and inserted at the beginning of the resulting Base64 encoded string.
member.param: The password to encrypt the data with.
The cipher key size. 256-bit is stronger, but slower.

member.name: M:Rijndael256.Rijndael.Encrypt(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Byte[],Rijndael256.KeySize)
member.summary: Encrypts data using the Rijndael cipher in CBC mode with a password derived HMAC SHA1 salt.
member.param: The password to encrypt the data with.
The cipher key size. 256-bit is stronger, but slower.

member.name: M:Rijndael256.Rijndael.Encrypt(System.String,System.String,System.String,Rijndael256.KeySize)
member.summary: Encrypts a file using the Rijndael cipher in CBC mode with a password derived HMAC SHA1 salt. A random 128-bit Initialization Vector is generated for the cipher, and inserted at the beginning of the resulting file.
member.param: The password to encrypt the file with.
The cipher key size. 256-bit is stronger, but slower.

member.name: M:Rijndael256.Rijndael.Decrypt(System.String,System.String,Rijndael256.KeySize)
member.summary: Decrypts data using the Rijndael cipher in CBC mode with a password derived HMAC SHA1 salt. This method expects a Base64 encoded string, with a 128-bit Initiliazation Vector embedded at the beginning of the data.
member.param: The password to decrypt the data with.
The size of the cipher key used to encrypt the data.

member.name: M:Rijndael256.Rijndael.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.String,Rijndael256.KeySize)
member.summary: Decrypts data using the Rijndael cipher in CBC mode with a password derived HMAC SHA1 salt. This method expects a 128-bit Initiliazation Vector embedded at the beginning of the data.
member.param: The password to decrypt the data with.
The size of the cipher key used to encrypt the data.

member.name: M:Rijndael256.Rijndael.Decrypt(System.Byte[],System.String,System.Byte[],Rijndael256.KeySize)
member.summary: Decrypts data using the Rijndael cipher in CBC mode with a password derived HMAC SHA1 salt.
member.param: The password to decrypt the data with.
The size of the cipher key used to encrypt the data.

member.name: M:Rijndael256.Rijndael.Decrypt(System.String,System.String,System.String,Rijndael256.KeySize)
member.summary: Decrypts a file using the Rijndael cipher in CBC mode with a password derived HMAC SHA1 salt. This method expects a 128-bit Initiliazation Vector embedded at the beginning of the file.
member.param: The password to decrypt the file with.
The size of the cipher key used to encrypt the data.

member.name: M:Rijndael256.Rijndael.GenerateRandomBytes(System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates an array of bytes using a cryptographically strong sequence of random values.

member.name: M:Rijndael256.Rijndael.GenerateKey(System.String,Rijndael256.KeySize)
member.summary: Generates a cryptographic key from the specified password.
member.param: The cipher key size. 256-bit is stronger, but slower.

member.name: M:Rijndael256.Rijndael.CreateEncryptor(System.String,System.Byte[],Rijndael256.KeySize)
member.summary: Creates a symmetric Rijndael encryptor.
member.param: The password to encrypt the data with.
The cipher key size. 256-bit is stronger, but slower.

member.name: M:Rijndael256.Rijndael.CreateDecryptor(System.String,System.Byte[],Rijndael256.KeySize)
member.summary: Creates a symmetric Rijndael decryptor.
member.param: The password to decrypt the data with.
